title: Smoked haddock cakes with wilted watercress and beurre blanc
ingredients: 450g/1lb floury potatoes (such as King Edward or Maris Piper), peeled and cut into chunks
4 tbsp finely chopped fresh flatleaf parsley
salt and freshly ground black pepper
125g/4oz mixed watercress and baby spinach leaves
salt and freshly ground black pepper
